page.title: 15LEISURE TIME AFTER SCHOOL
page.content: Leisure time after school. When we get home from school we change into our old clothes and play outside if we want to.We have a Play Park. Sometimes I go to piano lessons or draw or stick my stamps in my stamp album.Sometimes some girls stay at school and play Netball. I love doing that. We watch Televison sometimes. I'm a great lover of books. I can't keep my eyes off them! Sometimes I write my own stories which I dearly love doing. In my spare time after school I sometimes practise my ballet dance ready for competitions and exams.I'am always working for my Brownie badges. I have got 11 badges.I love Brownies.
